MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Barwood Hill and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:50am to progress with repairs to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. Our emergency response team is on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:01pm on the 6th of November 2020.
